docs.title: Welcome!
docs.text: I’m dedicated to dynamic systems and learning theory. Content is organized across the following sections.

docs.title: Posts
docs.text: Snippets of math and computer science.

docs.title: Publications
docs.text: Links to my journal and conference papers. Slides of invited talks. Useful (possibly..) code posted to GitHub/GitLab.

docs.title: Course Notes
docs.text: Compiled for practical reference.

docs.title: DevKB
docs.text: Data structures, algorithms, ICPC-style problems and system design. ML, backend and DevOps engineering.

docs.title: Awesome People
docs.text: Some people doing amazing work in dynamic systems and learning theory.

docs.title: Dev & Data
docs.text: Email / Website / LinkedIn / GitHub / GitLab / dev.to

docs.title: Consultant @ MetaOriginal
docs.text:
Startup that produces digital twins of real state assets.

(Jul 2022 - Aug 2022)

  • Mediated between MetaOriginal and companies such as PureWeb, nVidia Omniverse, etc.
  • Tested/documented a prototype Unreal Engine real-time streaming system.
  • Tech stack: PixelStreaming, Unreal Engine 4.25/4.27/5, GCloud, AWS, Azure

docs.title: Ruby on Rails Jr. Dev @ Original3D
docs.text:
Startup that produces digital twins of real state assets.

(Sep 2021 - Jan 2022)

  • Wrote all accounting/finance-related front/backend code.
  • Wrote hundreds of pages of software documentation.
  • Implemented testing suites related to business rules and user experience.
  • Tech stack: Ruby-on-Rails, React, Rails ORM, Cucumber, RSpec, Capybara

docs.title: ThreeJS Dev @ Original3D
docs.text:
Startup that produces digital twins of real state assets.

(Jul 2021 - Aug 2021)

  • Coded several ThreeJS MVPs.
  • Managed to import some 3D models into DOM using ThreeJS.
  • Tech stack: NodeJS, ThreeJS, TypeScript

docs.title: Backend Jr. Dev @ Oxfield
docs.text:
Consulting firm specialized in corporate IT solutions.

(Apr 2021 - Jun 2021)

  • Devised backend architechture: class diagrams, data models.
  • Backend implementation. Check this NodeJS/SQL login system.
  • Tech stack: NodeJS, Jest, SQL, ExpressJS, Typescript, Docker

docs.title: Freelance Engineer
docs.text:
(Jan 2017 - Apr 2022)

  • Designed a metallic structure to support the roof of a 510m² hangar.
  • Licensed by CREA, the Brazilian engineering council.

docs.title: Ad-hoc Analyst @ FE Structural Foundations
docs.text:
(Jan 2021 - permanent)

  • Reviewed maintenance operations of soil-drilling machines.

docs.title: Project Director @ AEROJAMPA
docs.text:
(Feb 2010 - Jul 2016) - Led a team of ~10 engineering undergrads.

  • Contributed to aircraft design projects on:

    • aerodynamics
    • structural design
    • performance
    • flight stability and control
    • multidisciplinary optimization

  • Built and presented design reports at the SAE Brasil Aerodesign International Competition, on the grounds of ITA/Embraer. As a team, we got 3rd best structural design at the 2012 competition.

  • Funded by private sponsors, PRG-UFPB and CNPq.

docs.title: Intern @ RECOGAS
docs.text:
RECOGAS, i.e., Brazil North/Northeast Natural Gas Research (RECOGAS), is a many-institution initiative dedicated to thermal energy systems.

(Jan 2017 - Apr 2022)

  • Re-designed a diaphragm pump for usage in refrigeration machinery running a H2O/NH3-based cogeneration cycle.
  • Solved several problems in fluid flow/heat transfer using generalized integral transforms.
  • Funded by CNPq.

docs.title: Researcher @ Unicamp, Dept. of Integrated Systems
docs.text:
(Aug 2016 - Mar 2023 expected)

  • Reviewed papers published/refereed at the Lab of System Identification & Control.
  • Wrote a paper and a dissertation on control of periodic systems.

docs.title: Mechatronics Teacher @ ESATEC
docs.text:
(Jan 2020 - Dec 2020)

  • In- and extra-class service to ~100 students.

  • Taught:

    • CNC Programming
    • Metrology
    • Technical Drawing
    • Manufacturing Technology
    • Production Management
    • Hydraulics and Pneumatics

docs.title: Math/Physics Teacher @ MacKenzie
docs.text:
(Jan 2020 - Jul 2021)

  • In- and extra-class service to ~50 students.

docs.title: Researcher @ Unicamp, Dept. of Computational Mechanics
docs.text:
(Apr 2019 - Dec 2019)

  • Wrote, with A. Alcântara, a research proposal rated ``excelent’’ by FAPESP.
  • Secured ~R$ 130000 in competitive research funding.
  • Published a paper.
  • A spin-off of this work went on to be developed at LAMMS-MIT.

docs.title: Teaching Assistant @ Unicamp Mech. Engineering
docs.text:
(Aug 2016 - Dez 2016)

  • ES601: Linear System Analysis with J. Camino:

    • Graded assignments and tests of ~70 undergrads.
    • Some lecturing/tutoring.
    • Reviewer/writer of class material.

  • EM707: Control of Mechanical Systems with A. Serpa.

    • Invited Feb 2017.

docs.title: Teaching Assistant @ UFPB Energy Engineering
docs.text:
(Sep 2014 - Jun 2016)

  • Subject 1701179: Fluid Mechanics II with G. Moreira.

    • Some tutoring.
    • Reviewer/writer of class material.

  • Passed selection with a 10/10 (only case).

docs.title: Freelance Teacher
docs.text:
(Aug 2016 - permanent)

  • Taught:

    • TOEFL Prep, students did great
    • Mechanical Vibrations
    • Linear Analysis / Control / Signal Processing
    • Machine Kinematics / Dynamics
    • Calculus / Physics
    • Thermodynamics / Heat Transfer

  • Taught from undergrads to college lecturers.

docs.title: Researcher @ Budapest Tech
docs.text:
(Jan 2014 - Aug 2014)

  • Coded simulations of highly nonlinear, hysteretical friction force models with J. Tóth and R. Csikja.

docs.title: Languages
docs.text: 🇺🇸 English: Fluent/native. 🇧🇷 Portuguese: Fluent/native. 🇪🇸 Spanish: Good reading, simple speech. 🇫🇷 French: Technical reading. 🇷🇺 Russian: Simple reading. 🇩🇪 German: On the way. 🇮🇱 Hebrew: On the way.

docs.title: Research Proposal Rated Excellent @ The São Paulo Research Foundation
docs.text:
(2019)

Secured ~R$ 130000 from the most competitive research funding agency in Brazil.

The proposal is top-notch, very well-crafted (…) work in multilevel analysis via the boundary element method on bone images for the detection of osteoporosis, is original, relevant and can bring relevant contributions to bioengineering and medicine. - FAPESP Comission

docs.title: M.Sc. Full Scholarship @ Mech. Engineering/Unicamp
docs.text:
(Aug 2016 - July 2018)

Got R$ 36000 in funding from CAPES PROEX academic excellence program.

docs.title: Recommendation from the Dean @ Mech. Engineering/Budapest Tech
B.Sc. Scholarship @ CAPES
docs.text:
(2013)

Got 22.000,00 € in funding from CAPES SwB program to study and do research at Mech. Engineering/Budapest Tech.

docs.text:
(2012)

Achieved as member of the Aerojampa team.

docs.title: 1st Place InterGEO Olympiad, Math/Physics Olympiad Finalist, Top GPA, …
docs.text:

Some small results in mid/high-school.

docs.title: Teacher @ Campinas Public Schools
docs.text:
(2019)

Invited workshops at EJA, a GED-style program for adults in Campinas, São Paulo, Brazil.

  • Check a sample lecture on cordel, a kind of poetry from northeastern Brazil.

docs.title: Grader @ Brazilian Robotics Olympiad
docs.text:
(2016)

The event comprises the IEEE Latin America/Brazil Robotics Competition_ and the Latin American/Brazil RoboCup Open. Worked with a team of ~10 arbitrers at the regional rounds.

docs.title: Functional Programming
docs.text:
Bob->Alice : hello

const splitName = (name) => name.split('_').join(' ');

const returnNameCapitalized = (name) => name.toUpperCase();

console.log(returnNameCapitalized(splitName('leonardo_maldonado')));
